column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Malnati Chicago Classic Deep Dish Pizza: 4/5. This was our first time having deep dish pizza ever
column2: but our hopes were high because we're pretentious. Unfortunately my lactose intolerance meant I could only have a few bites
column3: but I got the gist...very delicious crust (their signature "Buttercrust" I believe)
column4: lots of tasty meat and gooey cheese center. Really good! It fell slightly short of our expectations because it wasn't as deep as we'd hoped
column5: and the cheese was almost rubbery
column6: which is strange because it shouldn't have been sitting out for long before arriving to our table.
